results.name: Felix The Cat in Trouble At The Circus
Space Slayer (Hexnite, AdamJRidland99, George Osh, Ghalleon, Kman0115, ProfsrX, Grimlock421)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 monitor resolution, SSD recommended
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
